transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Uh Mohammad Juned ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu sir very good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir ek yaha pe concern aap raise kiya hua hai 18 November ko yani ki kal aapne wo apna concern raise kiya tha aur pehle bhi do baar aap apna concern raise yaha pe kar chuke ho. Jo Mr. Sunil ji hai unke sath aapka yaha pe Google meet pe discussion bhi hua tha unhone aapke product ko kuch mapping bhi correct ki thi. Main jaan sakti hu ki abhi bhi hame same problem face karni pad rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Same cheeze repeat ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To sir abhi main agar baat karu November ka hamara month yaha pe chal raha hai. To November ke month mein use to aap nahi kar rahe ho bilkul bhi?
Customer: To kya karu main?
Executive: Sir ek second main aapko ye bata deti hu. [inaudible] nahi aa raha hai. Maine complaint 10 baar kar diya mahina bhar ho gaya mahina dedh mahina something ho gaya.
Executive: Sir dekhiye complaint aap jo kar rahe ho wo cheez main aapki accept kar rahi hu I agree with you ki aap thik hai. Main wo cheez yaha pe dekh rahi hu. Rahi baat yaha pe aapke catalog ki to catalog yaha pe aapka properly thik kar diya gaya hai. Ab aise baar baar complaint karne se to kuch nahi hoga aap apne account manager ko connect kijiye aapke pass unka number hoga. Aap unko call kijiye aap unse baat kijiye unse kahiye aap help kijiye yaha par. Agar main yaha pe fast by
Customer: Fast by fast nahi dikhate wo fast nahi dikhate wo.
Executive: Fast by list agar main yaha pe jati hu na sir aapki to yaha pe fast by
Customer: Fast by fast me dikha wo fast nahi dikhate wo.
Executive: Fast by list me yaha pe aapke pass by list show kar rahi hai to kahi na kahi
Customer: Wo lead lead show nahi karti meri baat suno. Haan online active rehne ke baad me sirf fast me dikhata wo lead vagera kuch nahi dikhata hai wo.
Executive: Sir dekhiye jo fast me by list hum yaha pe dekh rahe hai to aapke product ki by list hame dikha raha hai aapke catalog pe. Agar wo hame dikha raha hai kyuki hum bhi aap hi ke catalog pe dekh rahe hai to for sure wo aapko bhi dikha raha hoga. To main aapko wahi cheez yaha pe samjha rahi hu ki aapke pass notification to aata hoga na jab koi aap by list
Customer: Nahi notification bhi kuch bhi nahi kuch bhi nahi aata wo sirf fast me dikhata hai. Active rehne ke baad me dekhta hu to fast me check karta hu ki abhi to me active tha uske baad me ye kaha se aa gaya.

Customer: Fast me sold out dikha deta hai isme.
Executive: Wo sold out dikhata is wajah se kyuki kahi na kahi wo ek ghanta pehle do ghante pehle ya fir ek din pehle wo by list aapko di gayi lekin wo aapne nahi liya us time par busy ho ya jo bhi cheez yaha pe rahi ho aap wo by list consume nahi kar paye ho. Wo is wajah se aap
Customer: Nahi nahi kabhi kabhar ek do baar hota hai baki kafi time thodi hota hai har time thodi hota hai.
Executive: Sir sir consumption rate ki agar main baat karu to abhi hamare November ka month chal raha hai na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na to November ke month mein agar char ghante ke andar andar yaha pe dekha jaye to yaha par aap sirf yaha par aap sirf 50% by list yaha pe aap consume kar rahe ho on time.
Customer: 50% by list aap mere ko rakhna hi nahi hai mere ko return refund ke liye requirement dal di maine.
Executive: Sir ek cheez refund to yaha pe aapko pehle bhi ye cheez batai gayi ki refund nahi hota hai. Ab ek cheez aap bataiye mujhe char mahine aapko use karte hue ho gaye aaj aap mujhe bol rahe ho ki
Customer: Nahi nahi dedh do mahine dedh do mahine pehle bhi kiya tha maine teen mahine tak dekho aap aisa ho jayega aisa ho jayega.
Customer: Ya to mere ko business do ya mere ko refund do.
Executive: Sir refund ka hota to definitely wo hum kara sakte hote na.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo sab kuch hota hai nahi nahi sab kuch hota hai. Nahi to fir nahi hoga to main social media pe mere jo followers hai un sabko main wo dal dunga main social media pe ye.
Customer: Follower bhi kafi hai mere.
Executive: Sir wo baat aapki bilkul thik hai lekin ye cheez to kuch galat hai na jaise aap bol rahe ho. Aap use to bhi nahi kar rahe ho. Aap is cheez me IndiaMART ki complaint nikal rahe ho hum to aapko by list dikha rahe hai na aapke pass. Ab aapko pata hai ki aapke pass
Customer: Ha dikha rahe hai aapke pass nahi fast me dikh raha hai waise to main kisi ko call karta hu na wo attend karta hai na wo kuch bhi karta hai na wapis koi reply deta hai.
Executive: Ab main kya aapko batau sir iske bare me.
Customer: Nahi maine starting me bhi call kiya tha aapke liye abhi to aapko naye ho naye ho to ek do mahine ruko fir dekhna aap aisa hoga waisa hoga sirf baate se baate se thodi hota hai.
Executive: Sir client to hum bhi apna kharab nahi karna chahte na.
Customer: Nahi kharab koi karna chahta hai main bhi to business ke liye paise deta maine.
Customer: Main pehle yahi bol raha tha main business de do mere ko yaha abhi to aap naye ho ek mahina hua hai do mahine dekho teen mahine se dekho ab ab aap aise bol rahe ho ki teen mahine ho gaye char mahine ho gaye.
Hmm.
Executive: Sir lekin agar by list aapke catalog pe show na karta wo tab hamari galti hoti na abhi wo show to kar raha hai na.
Customer: Kya show kar raha hai abhi?
Executive: By list to aapke catalog pe show kar raha hai na.
Customer: Wo catalog pe kar raha hai dusro otherwise shayad wo nahi dikha pa rahe.
Executive: Thik hai main ek baar apne senior se baat karti hu iske bare me.
Customer: Kisi dusre kisi dusre ko dikha nahi pa rahe. Mere ko to ab matlab nahi mere ko to mere ko to return ka hai wo jo bata do mere ko. Nahi to fir mere ko dusra option bhi mere pass hai.
Executive: Main apne senior se ek baar baat karti hu.
Customer: Ha jo bhi hai karke mere ko jawab dena.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads despite being active.

- Wants a refund due to lack of business.

- Threatens to post negative reviews on social media.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to escalate the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss the issue with senior.



Alert (If Any):

refund, escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, catalog, social media
